name: Cosa Nostra
storyline:
The world-renowned superdetective Mike Bronco was hired by the mayor of Chicago to combat and eliminate the organized crime that plagued the city in the 1920s. 
 
But it's hard work in Mike's category as he has to face off against the Big Five and their respective minions, who have dominated and terrorized the entire city.
summary: Side view commando style shooter from the 80s
